title: Alpine sunshine
brief_description: Skiing in the Austrian Tyrol. Little villages of a few houses and hotels which are deserted in summer attract hundreds of tourists for winter sports. From the nursery slopes skiers graduate to the weekly races, full day excursions into the mountains, and long runs down from the top of the chair lift.
